インタフェース
org.gjt.sp.util.ProgressObserver の使用

ProgressObserver を使用しているパッケージ
org.gjt.sp.jedit This package contains jEdit's core classes. 
org.gjt.sp.jedit.bufferio   
org.gjt.sp.jedit.io Virtual file system and multi-threaded I/O. 
org.gjt.sp.jedit.pluginmgr The plugin manager. 
org.gjt.sp.util Utility classes used by jEdit but that do not depend on jEdit itself. 
 

org.gjt.sp.jedit での ProgressObserver の使用
 

ProgressObserver 型のパラメータを持つ org.gjt.sp.jedit のメソッド
static boolean MiscUtilities.copyStream(int bufferSize, ProgressObserver progress, java.io.InputStream in, java.io.OutputStream out, boolean canStop)
          推奨されていません。 use IOUtilities.copyStream(int, org.gjt.sp.util.ProgressObserver, java.io.InputStream, java.io.OutputStream, boolean)
static boolean MiscUtilities.copyStream(ProgressObserver progress, java.io.InputStream in, java.io.OutputStream out, boolean canStop)
          推奨されていません。 use IOUtilities.copyStream(org.gjt.sp.util.ProgressObserver, java.io.InputStream, java.io.OutputStream, boolean)

          This worker will copy a file.

          Copy an input stream to an output stream with a buffer of 4096 bytes.
